body.name: MACHINIST X79 Server Motherboard, Intel 3th Gen LGA 2011 Computer PC Motherboards (Micro ATX, PCIe 3.0, NVME/SATA M.2, 4 Channel DDR3, USB 3.0, SATA 6Gbps) for Intel Xeon E5 V1/V2, Core i7 Processor
features: Intel 3th Gen LGA 2011 Socket: This computer pc motherboards is equipped with the X79 chipset. The LGA 2011 socket is compatible with Intel Xeon E5 V1 V2 and i7 series processors. (E5 2650 v2, E5-2660 v2, E5 2670 v2, i7 3970X, i7 4930K, etc.)

4-channel DDR3 memory slot: The newly upgraded X79 ddr3 motherboard has a 4-channel memory slot, which can be installed with single memory, compatible with DDR3 DIMM memory and DDR3 ECC server memory, and the maximum memory capacity is 4*16G. (support 800/1280/1333/1600/1866MHz frequency)

NVME/SATA M.2 interface: This micro ATX motherboard supports SATA M.2 and NVME M.2 SSDs. SATA M.2 adopts SATA channel, the maximum transfer rate is 6Gbps. NVME M.2 adopts PCI-E channel, and the maximum transmission rate can reach 32Gbps. It also supports hard drives of different sizes such as 2242, 2260 and 2280 M.2.

More expansion interfaces: The gaming motherboard has strong expandability, including 4*USB 2.0 (with 2 front interfaces), 2*USB 3.0 (with 1 front interface), 3*SATA 2.0, 1* SATA 3.0, 2*PS/2, 1*PCIE X16 and 1*PCIE X1 slots.

Performance chipset: The LGA 2011 motherboard comes standard with an entry-level ALC662 audio chip, which uses 3 stereo DACs, 2 stereo ADCs and a variety of 3D sound effects. RTL8111E Gigabit network card. NCT5532D super I/O chip can support two high-precision temperature sensors, thermal diodes and thermistors. Control the fan speed, monitor the computer hardware voltage, and ensure the normal operation of the computer in harsh environments.

Tips: Before purchasing this server motherboard, make sure you can install it yourself. After the motherboard is installed normally, if there is no display, no boot, no picture, no network card, no sound card, etc. It is recommended that the customer restore the factory settings, reset the CMOS or wipe the metal contact on the memory, CPU and graphics card (the part that contacts with the motherboard) with an eraser to improve the situation such as poor contact.

Tips: The package includes: 1*CPU fan bracket, 1*SATA cable, 1*I/O baffle, 1*main board. All the information of this product can be found in the description and pictures, of course you can also consult us. If you don't know where to download the driver, recommended driver download: Driver Talent. Or use the win 10 system, it can help you solve all driver problems.

Note: If you need the motherboard to enter the BIOS, please press the "Del" key continuously after pressing the startup key. Please do not wait until the startup LOGO screen appears on the computer screen before operating, because it is already too late.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MACHINIST X79 282h intel motherboard, 8-layer PCB design, 4-channel memory is only born for overclocking. Tips: If the motherboard does not display after normal installation, but the CPU fan is running normally. After turning off the power, take out the CPU and memory from the motherboard, and after reassembling, the computer can start normally. Please try several times, the problem will no longer occur after the computer starts normally. Installing Win 10 system can avoid many unnecessary troubles, and you can use the computer normally without downloading any drivers by yourself. The package includes: 1*CPU fan bracket, 1*SATA cable, 1*I/O baffle, 1*main board. All the information of this product can be found in the description and pictures. If you don't know where to download the driver, recommended driver download: Driver Talent. Note: If you need the motherboard to enter the BIOS, please press the "Del" key continuously after pressing the startup key. Please do not wait until the startup LOGO screen appears on the computer screen before operating, because it is already too late.

This micro ATX motherboard supports SATA M.2 and NVME M.2 SSDs. SATA M.2 adopts SATA channel, the maximum transfer rate is 6Gbps. NVME M.2 adopts PCI-E channel, and the maximum transmission rate can reach 32Gbps. Note: The conversion between the SATA M.2 interface and the NVME M.2 interface needs to be completed by the four black widgets on the right side. As shown in the figure above, if you are using an NVME M.2 hard drive, you can directly plug it into the motherboard and use it. At this time, the four small parts on the right side are installed in the "1, 2" positions of a 3-pin socket (counting from top to bottom). If you are using a SATA M.2 hard drive, you need to pull out all the four small black parts on the right side of the interface, and then install them in the "2, 3" positions of the 3-pin socket. After the motherboard is installed normally, if there is no display, no boot, no picture, no network card, no sound card, etc. It is recommended that the customer restore the factory settings or wipe the metal contact with an eraser on the memory, CPU and graphics card (the part that contacts with the motherboard) to improve the situation such as poor contact.
X79 server motherboard, onboard SATA 3.0 and USB 3.0 interfaces, Gigabit network to ensure smooth operation.

X79 V2.82H Motherboard Specifications Main Chipset X79 CPU Socket Intel LGA 2011(Support Intel i7 Xeon E5 V1/V2 Processor) Memory slot DDR3 ECC 4-channel (Support 1066/1333/1600 MHz) Maximum memory 64GB PCI-E standard PCI-E 3.0 PCI-E slot 1 * PCI-E X16, 1 * PCI-E X1 Storage interface 3 * SATA2.0, 1 * SATA3.0, 1 * M.2 NVME (Sopport NGFF) Sort of USB supported 4 * USB 2.0, 2 * USB 3.0 Onboard LAN 1 * RJ45 Power connector 24pin + 8pin Motherboard type Micro ATX Overclock Support Usage Scenario Gaming/Audio & Video/Household/Office/Design/Video Production Motherboard size 23.5 * 18.5 cm Other interfaces 2 * PS/2 interface, 3 * audio interface Package list Original box, i/o blocking, sata cable, CPU fan bracket

MR9A MAX motherboard X99-RS9 Motherboard X99-MR9A Motherboard X79 D7 Motherboard H81 Motherboard B75-PRO Motherboard Chipset Type Intel B85 Intel B85 Intel B85 Intel X79 Intel H81 Intel B75 Available 120.99 88.99 112.99 88.99 80.99 69.99 RAM Memory Maximum Size DDR4 ECC 128GB DDR4 ECC 64GB DDR4 ECC 64GB DDR3 ECC 64GB DDR3 16GB DDR3 16GB Memory Slot DDR4*4 Four channels( 2133/2666/3200MHz) DDR4*4 Four channels( 2133/2400/2666/3000MHz) DDR4*4 Four channels( 2133/2400/2666/3000MHz) DDR3*4 Dual channel (Support 1033/1333/1600/2133/2400MHz) DDR3*2 Dual channel(Support 1333/1600MHz) DDR3*2 Dual channel(Support 1280/1333/1600/1866MHz) CPU PIN LGA 2011-V3 LGA 2011-V3 LGA 2011-V3 LGA-2011 LGA 1150 LGA 1155 Extension Ports 3*PCIE X16, 1*PCIE X4 and 1*PCIE X1 1*PCIe 3.0 X16, 2*PCIe X1 2*PCIe 3.0 X16, 1*PCIe X4, 1*PCIe X1 1*PCIe 2.0 X16, 1*PCIe X1 1*PCIe 2.0 X16, 1*PCIe X1 1*PCIe 2.0 X16, 1*PCIe X1, 1*PCI Number of SATA 4 * SATA 3.0, 2 * SATA 2.0 4* SATA 3.0 4* SATA3.0, 2* SATA2.0 3* SATA 2.0, 1*SATA 3.0 2* SATA2.0, 2*SATA3.0 3* SATA 2.0, 1*SATA 3.0 M.2 Interface NVME M.2, SATA M.2 NVME M.2, SATA M.2 NVME M.2, SATA M.2 M.2 NVME（Sopport NGFF) SATA M.2 SATA M.2 Support overclocking ✓ Supported Motherboard ATX Micro ATX ATX Micro ATX Micro ATX Micro ATX

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mico ATX X79 motherboard
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these motherboards and they both worked right out of the box. I installed 32gb or DDR3 ECC ram with a E5-2696 V2 CPU with 12 cores. These systems both work great for just under $100. Not bad to refresh my old FX8350 and FX6300 systems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It failed after less than 45 days.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Board worked okay for a bit. missing XMP setting and most bios settings do nothing as the bios is fubar. Also after installing a windows a lot of the drivers did not automatically install like they should have. In fact there were 10 core base system drivers that were uninstallable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lack of manual Great Price Worked Fine
reviews.reviewText: At the end of the day the mother board worked great. Great price. Drivers downloaded fine with fresh windows install. But for the lack of a manual I would have given 5 stars. I strongly suggest you print out the product pictures at the top of the ad to help decipher the proper connections. Due to the lack of a manual, this board is probably not appropriate for beginners. Be aware that there is no built in video connection or WiFi and only one pci slot. This board allowed me to resurrect an older PC using cannibalized parts: CPU, video card, ram and drives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars well made board works out of the box.simple classic bios and well spread.
reviews.reviewText: this motherboard made in china is really showing how those brand name board is ripping peoples money.? thank you AMAZON money well spent .the bios of the motherboard is well designed and conrolling all features .this things is a marvell of technology for less money.I will go chiness motherboard again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good board for the price. A few "quirks" in setting it up though. Edited - not so good now.
reviews.reviewText: I came back to edit my review, because I'm having trouble with this mobo now. I stand beside what I said below, but I'm now having trouble with one of the 2 I have, and the other doesn't get used as much. Now the PC reboots randomly and sometimes never gets past the BIOS POST before rebooting. To be fair, it could be my power supply, but it cost me more than the mobo if I remember correctly. I've swapped out the CPU once and the DIMMs several times, since I have spares. The seller does not seem to be taking questions any more, and the links at the top of their store page don't work. I guess I'm stuck. Well, Machinist, I hope to be getting my hands on an E5-2680 or 2690 and DDR4 soon, and I WILL NOT be buying a Machinist mobo to put those in. (Your mileage may vary....)Original Review:I now have 2 of these boards, one running Windows 10 and one running Windows 11. They have 10-core Xeon E5-2670 v2 CPUs and 64GB of DDR3-1866 RAM, and one boots off a SATA M.2 stick. They do not provide a printed manual with the board. Make sure you read all the info in the listing, and especially all the Q&A if you are going to use a SATA M.2 or NVMe M.2 stick - the jumper settings they show seem to be reversed. Also, since the board has no onboard video, you'll need a PCIe video card. Some of the components near the CPU socket made it so one heat sink I already had wouldn't fit so I had to buy one. I don't know if I'd recommend this board to a complete beginner, but for anyone with some experience building PCs it is a breeze to get going.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stable as heck, and a great use for recycled ewaste
reviews.reviewText: First off, if you’re buying this, you know what you’re doing with computers. This board is stable, and uses the unconventional server chipset with custom bios. Linus discussed this in a video; it’s an effective way to recycle bad server boards and reduce eWaste. I’m using a cheap quad core Xeon to use as a basic machine at my work for iTunes, backing up hard drives, and other assorted pc/phone tech support things. Have had no issues with this board, nor other Machinist boards I’ve encountered in the past.If you’re looking to recycle some old parts and make a functional machine for home use (gaming would also be good with the right CPU, a 3930k or something) then this will tick all the boxes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Machinist X79 motherboard
reviews.reviewText: Will never buy again. I ordered to build pc… brought to a place to be built and they said that the motherboard is damaged. It doesn’t work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just the ticket to give an old processor a new life.

reviews.reviewTitle: Did what it needed to do.
reviews.reviewText: Booted up fine, was a bit tough to get lined up properly with the standoffs in my case, due to the IO shield being tough to get fully seated, but eventually it worked. BIOS does not appear to let me modify the multiplier on an unlocked CPU, but otherwise it is great bang for your buck.
It worked, about 50% overpriced compared to buying direct. No USB 3.0, otherwise pretty good. I recommend adding lot of case fans for airflow as the heatsinks are not the greatest.
faut vraiment allé chercher les drivers sur leur site conseillémais a par sa pas problème

reviews.reviewTitle: She works! i7 3820, 32gb ddr3 and a 1060
reviews.reviewText: Booted up on the first try and so far so good!
